name: Wacom Cintiq 22 LCD Pen Tablet
description:
This is a Wacom Cintiq 22 LCD pen display.  I purchased it about two years ago, but it turned out to be heavier and larger than I anticipated, so I barely used it.

Functionality has been confirmed.
It comes with a Wacom Pro Pen 2, and three replacement nibs are still unused and brand new.

- Model Name: Wacom Cintiq 22
- Size: 21.5 inch
- Connection Type: USB, HDMI
- Features: LCD Pen Display
